content:  three easy pieces wash clothes  by elizabeth carls ©2009 these three super easy wash/dish cloth patterns were designed for my get your knit on workshop they are intended to be the first three projects for the brand new knitter giving them the opportunity to practice their new skills casting on knitting purling and binding off while completing a project they can use with pride three easy pieces wash clothes © 2009 by elizabeth carls - all right reserved - this pattern is intended for personal use only you may use it to knit for yourself or for charity no commercial reproduction of the pattern or the socks is permitted thanks so much three easy pieces wash clothes needle size u s size 7 4 5 mm straight or circular yarn any worsted weight machine washable cotton or cotton blend yarn yarn requirements about 300 yards total wash/dish cloth #1 stockinette co 35 stitches row 1 6 knit every row row 7 knit row 8 k4 purl to last 4 stitches k4 repeat row 7 & 8 for 44 row 22 repeats row 51- 57 knit every row bobble loosely weave in ends wash/dish cloth #2 box stitch co 42 stitches row 1 k2 *p2 k2* repeat row 2 p2 *k2 p2* repeat row 3 same as row 2 row 4 same as row 1 repeat these 4 row for 56 row bobble loosely weave in ends wash/dish cloth #3 garter ridges co 35 stitches row 1 3 4 and 6 knit every stitch row 2 and 5 purl every stitch repeat these 6 row for 60 row bobble loosely weave in ends www elizabethcarls com page 2
